# Introduction

My name is J Steven Raquel. I graduated from the University of California, Santa Barbara, with a B.S. in Statistical Science. I am currently a data analyst for Saalex Solutions, Inc., an engineering and technology company headquarted in Camarillo, CA.

In my free time I am an avid gamer and I study languages, particularly Spanish and Portuguese. I aspire to travel across both Europe and Latin America someday.

* Email: jsteven.raquel8@gmail.com
* GitHub: [jstevenr](https://github.com/jstevenr)
* LinkedIn: [jstevenr](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jstevenr/)
